headline: General Industrial Machinery Stocks Q4 Recap: Benchmarking Illinois Tool Works (NYSE:ITW)
summary: The end of an earnings season can be a great time to discover new stocks and assess how companies are handling the current business environment. Let’s take a look at how Illinois Tool Works (NYSE:ITW) and the rest of the general industrial machinery stocks fared in Q4.
